E Tailers Haul It In

06 Dec 1999

CNNfn reports that business was bustling on-line during the Thanksgiving holiday weekend.

The report finds that customers spent US $500 Million on-line, and that the busiest day of the week was the Saturday after Thanksgiving, countering the popular brick and mortar Friday after Thanksgiving spending spree.

Get the full scoop for yourself.
